TextLibrary.Text: You have failed to defeat the Sandworm, you must try again.
You have defeated the Sandworm. You must return to Red-Axe in the city of Tusk.
Red-Axe is pleased with your progress.
You must travel to the Worm Cave and confront a Giant Sandworm.
You must now return to Red-Axe in Tusk for your reward.
